code: import{DELETE_EMAIL,GET_EMAILS}from"../types/subscriptionType";var subscriptionReducer=function subscriptionReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_EMAILS:return action.payload;case DELETE_EMAIL:return state.filter(function(item){return item._id!==action.payload;});default:return state;}};export default subscriptionReducer;
